mainText:
Loss of Steve Jobs life today will probably be the greatest loss for many generations in terms of innovations that are yet to come in the future. The world will always be grateful for his effort and vision, which has touched millions of people's lives around the world in so many ways people are using Apple products in their everyday life.

He will be greatly missed, our condolences to his family and friends, and we
 wish Apple the very best.
author: Amrit
